body:
## Bug Report Running sysbench oltp_write_only workload causes TiKV release-4.0 aborts.
Backtrace

``` warning: Unable to find libthread_db matching inferior's thread library, thread debugging will not be available. Core was generated by `/tikv-server --addr=0.0.0.0:20160 --advertise-addr=tikv4:20160 --data-dir=/data'. Program terminated with signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault. #0 0x00007f8f254939df in abort () from /usr/glibc-compat/lib/libc.so.6 [Current thread is 1 (LWP 112)] warning: Missing auto-load script at offset 0 in section .debug_gdb_scripts of file /tikv-server. Use `info auto-load python-scripts [REGEXP]' to list them. #0 0x00007f8f254939df in abort () from /usr/glibc-compat/lib/libc.so.6 #1 0x00007f8f2548ad67 in ?? () from /usr/glibc-compat/lib/libc.so.6 #2 0x00007f8f2548ae12 in __assert_fail () from /usr/glibc-compat/lib/libc.so.6 #3 0x000055dede06daaa in rocksdb::IterKey::UpdateInternalKey (this=0x7f8dd4043148, seq=0, t=rocksdb::kTypeValue) at /home/stn/.cargo/git/checkouts/rust-rocksdb-a9a28e74c6ead8ef/98aea25/librocksdb_sys/rocksdb/db/dbformat.h:424 #4 0x000055dede0b6b54 in at /home/stn/.cargo/git/checkouts/rust-rocksdb-a9a28e74c6ead8ef/98aea25/librocksdb_sys/rocksdb/table/block_based/block.cc:132 #6 0x000055dedde880e8 in rocksdb::BlockBasedTableIterator::Next std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start () at src/libstd/sys/unix/thread.rs:80 #67 0x00007f8f25a33d2c in ?? () from /usr/glibc-compat/lib/libpthread.so.0 #68 0x00007f8f25553e3f in clone () from /usr/glibc-compat/lib/libc.so.6 ```

### What version of TiKV are you using? Dev build TiKV @https://github.com/tikv/tikv/commit/08d7dc17d30af3aa948d5af655fda379bff00c0c ``` git checkout 08d7dc17d30af3aa948d5af655fda379bff00c0c cargo build -p cmd --bin tikv-server ``` ### Steps to reproduce ```bash sysbench --db-driver=mysql --mysql-host=tidb --mysql-port=4000 --mysql-user=root --mysql-db=test --time=30000000 --report-interval=10 --threads=256 --tables=10 --table-size=50000 oltp_write_only --auto_inc=off prepare sysbench --db-driver=mysql --mysql-host=tidb --mysql-port=4000 --mysql-user=root --mysql-db=test --time=30000000 --report-interval=10 --threads=5 --tables=10 --table-size=50000 oltp_write_only --mysql-ignore-errors=1062 --auto_inc=off --skip_trx=on --delete_inserts=3 run ``` ### What did you expect? Not aborts ### What did happened? Aborts.
title: Point getter aborts in RocksDB iterator Next()
